twitter.name: Sarah Udoma
twitter.comment: I use this app all the time and it's doing a great job of keeping me up to date with what's going on in the soccer-world.

twitter.name: Noah Jackson
twitter.comment: I use this app every day and it's a great way to keep up to date with what's going on in football. It's a shame it won't rotate into landscape mode like its main competitor

twitter.name: Darren Wilson
twitter.comment: Good for scores and commentary but the team lineups have stopped working.

twitter.name: Michael Akinuli
twitter.comment: Good for watching the goals and great for highlights instead of waiting till 10:30 before you can watch highlights on March of the day also no need of sky go

twitter.name: Lionel Messi
twitter.comment: I think this is the best app in the world... Even better than my soccer career...

twitter.name: Pel√©
twitter.comment: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
